nodes.text: Kalar'naa was a female Twi'lek dancer and agent for the Black Sun criminal syndicate who operated on the planet Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Skinkner tasked a spacer with eliminating Kalar'naa due to being suspected for leaking information.

Kalar'naa was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
Kalar'naa's appearance was randomized during each quest, but she always appeared as a female Twi'lek. The quest dialogue also confirmed her species and gender.
